text: Ta qing ta de shuangqin zuo zai gaozuo shang, tamen wei ta er fufu koutou. Ta shuo:â€œWo de fuqin a! Zhe jiushi wo yiqian de meng zhao de jieshi. Wo de zhu yi shi nage meng zhao bian cheng wei shishile. Ta que yi youdai wo, yinwei ta ba wo cong jianyu li shifang chulai, ta zai emo lijian wo he wo gegemen zhihou, ba ni cong shamo lidai dao zheli lai. Wo de zhu, dui tasuo yiyu zhe shi ci'ai de. Ta que shi quanzhi de, que shi zhi rui de
